This is a very PATHETIC situation in our country. Cheating people from PRESIDENT to the peon. What I have seen in the recent past is that all these companies owned by some owners put forward their Sinhalese employees to counter the " loss of sales " in the market. Most of these senior managers are just " designated directors" . They dont have shares in such companies. This group is owned by Rajaiyas . Why cant we just be honest to ourselves and overcome such challenges as an ethical company. I dont think sri lankans are racists. Resorting to such very low unethical practices will only work further against their performance.

Air freshener eeta wada hanikaray.kojomawunath honda ayathanayak. Godak piyawara Aran tiyenawa parisaraya rakagena factory eka pawathwagena yanna. Murillo Factory athulatha awith jara kalath owunta kisima haaniyak karanna egollo kamathi naa. Hari piliwelata pirisiduwata tiyenawa ewunaata. Sewakayoth godak hodin sewaya karana thanak
Pitaratawala nam kiyanne air freshner tharam handunkuruwalin haniyak naha kiyala. Eth samahara ratawala hadana handun kuruth air freshner wage.
Mulu lokema uthurata pihinanakota ape kattiya hondai hondai kiyala dakunata pihinanawa. Samahara air frshner pilika karaka.
